original_text: These are the journeys of the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt with their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.
korean_text: 모세와 아론의 인도로 대오를 갖추어 애굽을 떠난 이스라엘 자손들의 노정은 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are the journeys of the children of Israel
which went forth out of the land of Egypt
under the hand of Moses and Aaron
